mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT * FROM pat_temp WHERE DATE(TEMP_DATE) = #{tempDate} ORDER BY TEMP_DATE DESC LIMIT 10 ) AS NEW_TEMP ORDER BY TEMP_DATE
SELECT AVG(TEMP) AS TEMP FROM pat_temp
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(TEMP_DATE)) AS DATE_NUM FROM pat_temp

SELECT DATE(TEMP_DATE) AS DATE , HOUR(TEMP_DATE) AS HOUR , AVG(TEMP) AS TEMP , FLOOR(MINUTE(TEMP_DATE) / 30) * 30 AS MINUTE FROM pat_temp WHERE DATE(TEMP_DATE)=#{tempDate} GROUP BY HOUR(TEMP_DATE) , DATE(TEMP_DATE) , FLOOR(MINUTE(TEMP_DATE) / 30) * 30 ORDER BY DATE, HOUR, MINUTE;
SELECT DATE(TEMP_DATE) AS DATE , HOUR(TEMP_DATE) AS HOUR , AVG(TEMP) AS TEMP FROM pat_temp WHERE DATE(TEMP_DATE)=#{tempDate} GROUP BY HOUR(TEMP_DATE), DATE(TEMP_DATE) ORDER BY DATE, HOUR;
SELECT * FROM pat_temp WHERE TEMP_DATE BETWEEN #{tempDate} - INTERVAL 1 HOUR AND #{tempDate} - INTERVAL 0 MINUTE;
SELECT * FROM pat_temp WHERE TEMP_DATE BETWEEN #{tempDate} - INTERVAL 30 MINUTE AND #{tempDate} - INTERVAL 0 MINUTE;
SELECT MONTH(TEMP_DATE) AS MONTH, DAY(TEMP_DATE) AS DAY FROM pat_temp GROUP BY MONTH(TEMP_DATE), DAY(TEMP_DATE)
